title: Deals: Apple M1 Mac mini from $570, latest 24-inch M1 iMac $249 off, more
content:
Starting a new month, all of today’s best deals are now up for the taking with the M1 Mac mini dropping to Amazon lows from $570. That’s alongside up to $249 discounts on the 24-inch M1 iMac and the Philips Hue Bluetooth Lightstrip Plus down to $85. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Apple M1 Mac mini from $570, latest 24-inch M1 iMac $249 off, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A pair of all-time lows have gone live on Apple's latest M1 Macs, taking $249 off the iMac alongside Mac mini from $570.
